item.title: Site
item.description: Sites to follow | Webs a seguir Spotted a mistake? | Ha vist cap error? This page is intented to put together stuff that does not belong to the other sections, such as a list of websites to follow, very long posts, MOOC & book reviews and recomendations, blogposts with a unifying theme and other aspects related to this website. Sites to follow | Webs a seguir This is a list of websites I usually visit, although a few are quite inactive.
